vlive.korean: 이 화면에 리듬에 맞춰 날아오는 불덩이가 있어요. The screen will show you a fireball flying towards you in a rhythm. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 세븐틴의 '아주 NICE' DAY COMEBACK COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: The screen will show you a fireball flying towards you in a rhythm.

examples.korean: a sheet of flame 발음듣기 거대하게 퍼져 이동하는 불덩이 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Witnesses spoke of a great ball of flame. 발음듣기 증인들이 거대한 불덩이에 대해 언급했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Witnesses spoke of a great ball of flame. 발음

examples.korean: Your forehead’s burning. Have you got a fever? 발음듣기 네 이마가 아주 뜨거워[불덩이야]. 너 열나니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Your forehead’s burning. Have you got a fever? 발음

examples.korean: Flaming fragments were still falling from the sky. 발음듣기 아직도 하늘에서 불이 꺼지지 않은 불덩이들이 떨어지고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Flaming fragments were still falling from the sky. 발음

examples.korean: The sun was a huge ball of fire low on the horizon. 발음듣기 해는 지평선[수평선]에 낮게 걸린 거대한 불덩이 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sun was a huge ball of fire low on the horizon. 발음
